content: The only illegal activity that matters regarding voting in this country is voter suppression. But the moral and political filth that is the Republican Party, as well as its allies who pollute this site, will continue seeking to kill the legitimacy of America’s elections until they get the one party state they desire. We are dealing with totalitarians no better than Communists in Russia or Mussolini’s Fascists, enemies of all decent values. Like totalitarians have always done, they accuse their opponents of doing what they are doing in order to confuse decent people who do not lie as easily as breathe.
